title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 254.1 - Hearing officers; powers and duties
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 254.1 - Hearing officers; powers and duties

State Regulations

All hearing officers, fact-finders, and any other
individuals designated by the board to hold hearings, are hereby designated by
the board as its agents: (a) to
conduct and be in full charge and control of any and all hearings; (b) in connection with such hearings, to have
access to and the right to copy evidence, to administer oaths and affirmations, to examine witnesses, to receive evidence, and in connection therewith, to do
any and all things necessary and proper to effectuate the policies of SERA and
this Subchapter. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12

254.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
